sentences.en: Murphy, Sinclair's young teammate, was fractionally behind him.
sentences.cn: 辛克莱尔的年轻队友墨菲紧随其后。

sentences.en: If a basketball star is, for example, trying to gain a high personal point total, he may take a shot himself when it would be better to pass the ball to a teammate, affecting the team's performance.
sentences.cn: 比如一个篮球明星为了获得高的个人总得分，他可能会在最好把球传给队友的情况下自己出手，影响球队的表现。
